I am a MSC student who study Advanced Computer Science at Cardiff University. In the past, I developed 4 universal iOS applications which can be downloaded on app store. Most of my experience is with Objective-C, Python and Swift. I enjoy learning Machine Learning and algorithm for leisure. Although I am still a beginner in these areas, I have strong and contiuous learning capability and adaptility.
